product_name: CliniqueClinique For Men Anti-Fatigue Eye Gel
summary: SummaryClinique For Men Anti-Fatigue De-Puffing Eye Gel is a cooling, roll-on gel that instantly re-energizes and brightens tired-looking eyes.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin Types.Instantly refreshes and brightens tired-looking eyes.Hydrates and comforts with humectants that bind moisture to skin.Apply anytime to wake up eyes.Absorbs quickly.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Non-acnegenic.Allergy tested.Key IngredientsHyaluronic acid attracts and binds moisture to skin.Caffeine infuses skin with energy.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilDenatured alcoholSynthetic colorsSLSSLESSulfatesGlutenFragranceItem 2234063How To UseUsing gentle pressure, roll under each eye from inner corner to outer corner twice. Apply morning, night and as needed throughout the day.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Caffeine, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) Extract, Panthenol, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Extract, Selaginella Tamariscina (Spike Moss) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Fruit Juice, Linoleic Acid, Yeast Extract / Faex / Extrait De Levure, Biosaccharide Gum - 1, Linolenic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Laureth-7, Glycine, Carbomer, Cyclodextrin, Hydroxyproline, Acrylates Copolymer, Proline, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Polyacrylamide, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylbisiminomethylguaiacol Manganese Chloride, Nordihydroguaiaretic Acid, Xanthan Gum, Hexylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Mica.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Using gentle pressure, roll under each eye from inner corner to outer corner twice. Apply morning, night and as needed throughout the day.
ingredients: Yeast Extract / Faex / Extrait De Levure
Mica.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: Not for Puffy Eyes
reviews.comments: This product doesn't work for puffy eyes. I have used it everyday now for two weeks,  my puffy eyes are in the same condition.  Puffy.  I have not seen a hint the product is working for me.

reviews.headline: I would NOT buy this product again.
reviews.comments: After using several product for eye puffiness, including this one, I suppose there really isn't a product that helps with eye puffiness. No, so sorry, Clinique's product did not help.

reviews.headline: Halfway product really !
reviews.comments: I got this i was excited I didn't least because it was halfway product in it so disappointed

reviews.headline: I wouldn't waste your money
reviews.comments: I was hopeful and tried this product as recommended to me at Ulta. Got home and tried it on myself and my spouse. Noticed a slight difference on my spouse but nothing happened when I used it. No improvement in my eye bags. Tried using several times over a few days and still nothing.

reviews.headline: Such a waste
reviews.comments: Been using this product for 2 weeks now and no change with the bags under my eyes. So far a waste of money

reviews.headline: A men's go to eye de puffer
reviews.comments: I bought it for my husband as he had big old bags under his eyes and this eye roller has helped reduce the puffiness and dark circles under his eyes.

reviews.headline: Does what it says
reviews.comments: I have tried numerous de-puffing eye products and this is the only one that works for me. It takes a few days to see results if you've never used it before, but suddenly you'll realize your eyes aren't puffy anymore. It feels wonderful going on too. Cool and very soothing.

reviews.headline: BF Loves It!
reviews.comments: In my opinion this is the exact same as the All About Eyes that is targeted to women. Love both formulas, have been using for years now and will continue to do so. Got my bf his own so he could stop stealing mine - he is a zero maintenance man and this is convenient enough for even him. It's pricey but it lasts a good 6 months to a year so you get your money's worth.

reviews.headline: Reduces puffiness
reviews.comments: I like this product because it reduces the puffiness under my eyes. I'm sure that you will notice when a person's face is like that right under their eyes. They look like they are tired. This takes care of that. It takes a few applications for it to take effect. But you shall notice a difference shortly.

reviews.headline: dissatisfied with purchase...adv free clinque gift w/purchas
reviews.comments: bought this because i thought a free face scrub was a great price.  turns out the free face scrub is a small tube not even travel size but a sample.  live and learn. btw product doesn't do anything for under my eyes.

reviews.headline: Lifesaver for husband
reviews.comments: My husband has puffy eyes and at times dark circles. I bought this for him recently and it has worked great! It really reduces the puffiness under his eyes and does a pretty good job on his dark circles.

reviews.headline: Cool as a Cucumber
reviews.comments: I love this product. Recommended by a female coworker I found it to have an immediate effect on my dark circles and puffiness from a week of long nights. A little pricey but worth it.

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: good product but a bit pricey for a small size.

reviews.headline: helps so much with dark circles
reviews.comments: I naturally have dark under eyes, no matter how much rest I get, they are always there. I have tried similar products that were more expensive and saw no results at all. This is amazing. It works instantly, feels good on the skin, tightens the skin instantly, and instantly removes dark circles, it is great to pick up and use multiple times a day if needed

reviews.headline: My favorite ever!
reviews.comments: Help with my puffines under my eyes ,light defenitly my favorite!

reviews.headline: It feels good!
reviews.comments: It's make me feel so relax around my eyes

reviews.headline: Needs more bang for the buck!
reviews.comments: I wished,for the price,it did more than cool the eyes temporarily. I was looking for a product to help with under eye puffiness. Oh well.Another strike.

faceoff_positive.comments: In my opinion this is the exact same as the All About Eyes that is targeted to women. Love both formulas, have been using for years now and will continue to do so. Got my bf his own so he could stop stealing mine - he is a zero maintenance man and this is convenient enough for even him. It's pricey but it lasts a good 6 months to a year so you get your money's worth.
faceoff_positive.headline: BF Loves It!

faceoff_negative.comments: I wished,for the price,it did more than cool the eyes temporarily. I was looking for a product to help with under eye puffiness. Oh well.Another strike.
faceoff_negative.headline: Needs more bang for the buck!
